title: BSC method handler crashed
body:
#### System information


OS & Version: Ubuntu22.04

Commit hash :  a1cd46c5beb796f158b585369728786a30fd207c

ChainID: 56

tags:

```
        "--prune=",
        "--prune.r.before=16000000",
        "--prune.h.older=5000",
        "--prune.t.older=5000",
        "--prune.c.older=5000".
        "--torrent.download.rate=25000mb",
        "--downloader.verify",
        "--db.pagesize=16k",
```

my rpc request
```
curl 'localhost:8545' \
  -H 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data-raw '{
      "method":"eth_getLogs",
      "params":[
          {
              "fromBlock":"0xfa32c8",
              "toBlock":"latest",
              "address":"0x00000",
              "topics":[
                  "0x00000"
              ]
          }
      ],
      "id":44,
      "jsonrpc":"2.0"
  }' \
  --compressed
```

Yesterday returned error: method handler crashed 

follow #5747 #5698 , i delete all file in $PWD/snapshots

rerun erigon, I went through download, downloader.verify and [snapshots]Indexing

now rpc response
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 44,
  "error": {
    "code": -32000,
    "message": "block not found 21772057"
  }
}

curl --request POST 'localhost:8545' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{
        "jsonrpc":"2.0",
        "method":"eth_blockNumber",
        "params":[],
        "id":83
}' -s | jq
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 83,
  "result": "0x1567feb" # 22446059
}
```


Why does `method handler crashed` occur multiple times on different versions

How should we fix this problem?

erigon logs, Sync is stuck now

```
[INFO] [10-24|15:38:35.930] [8/16 HashState] Incremental promotion   from=22447222 to=22447293 codes=false csbucket=AccountChangeSet
[INFO] [10-24|15:38:36.589] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=96

[WARN] [10-24|15:38:51.703] Served                                   conn=192.168.96.3:51596 method=eth_getLogs reqid=44 t=52.933158ms err="block not found 21772057"
[EROR] [10-24|15:38:52.258] Staged Sync                              err="[1/16 Snapshots] retireBlocksInSingleBackgroundThread: [1/16 Snapshots Prune] retire blocks error: DumpBlocks: DumpHeaders: header missed in db: block_num=21500000,  hash=98fdff4e0cf2c982b466863692ea53afac00f1164e10b8a09e02bd77aa0a9373, fromBlock=21500000, toBlock=22000000"
[INFO] [10-24|15:38:54.037] [2/16 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=22447222
[INFO] [10-24|15:39:14.038] [2/16 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period block number=22447222

[INFO] [10-24|15:39:54.038] [2/16 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period block number=22447222

[INFO] [10-24|15:40:34.038] [2/16 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period block number=22447222

```

thx for youer reply, i add tag `--snap.stop` and rerun, RPC still doesn't work

Are you about this warnings in logs?
```
WARN[10-24|16:19:52.083] Served                                   conn=10.0.0.2:48666 method=eth_getLogs reqid=44 t=36.220642ms err="block not found 21772057"
WARN[10-24|16:19:11.029] [1/16 Snapshots] Some blocks are not in snapshots and not in db max_in_snapshots=21499999 min_in_db=22350000
```
If yes: can fix it by `integration stage_headers --reset`

```
build/bin/integration stage_headers --reset --datadir .local/share/erigon --chain bsc
WARN[10-24|17:27:40.252] no log dir set, console logging only
```

This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
